root.name: Strong Bad's Cool Game for Attractive People
root.description: OverviewA five part episodic point and click adventure game, developed by Telltale Games and based on the Strong Bad character from the animated web series; Homestar Runner, by brothers Matt and Mike Chapman.Games in seriesThere are 5 games in Season 1 ofStrong Bad's Cool Game for Attractive People. They are: Episode 1: Homestar Ruiner Episode 2: Strong Badia the Free Episode 3: Baddest of the Bands Episode 4: Dangeresque 3: The Criminal Projective Episode 5: 8-bit is Enough DistributionSeason 1 is available directly from TellTale's website for download or on disc. It is also available for download on Steam and the Playstation Network. System RequirementsMinimum RequirementsOperating System: Windows XP / VistaProcessor: 2.0 GHz Pentium 4 or equivalentRAM Memory: 512MB (1GB recommended)Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 sound deviceVideo Card: 64MB DirectX 8.1-compliant video card (128MB rec.)DirectX®: Version 9.0c or betterRecommended RequirementsOperating System: Windows XP / VistaProcessor: 3 GHz Pentium 4 or equivalentRAM Memory: 1GBSound Card: DirectX 8.1 sound deviceVideo Card: 128MB DirectX 8.1-compliant video cardDirectX®: Version 9.0c or better
